privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: Payment Tracker app respects your privacy and protects your personal data.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: Our app does not collect any personal data. All your payment and income information is stored locally on your device.

dataStorage.title: Data Storage
dataStorage.content: All your data is stored in your device's local storage. No data is sent to our servers or third-party servers.

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.content: Your data is not shared with any third parties. We do not use advertising networks or analytics services.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.content: The app uses local notifications for payment reminders. These notifications are generated and sent entirely on your device.
